name: Ex-Machina (simon4.harris)
description:
As Ava you will be running away from the Facility trying to escape without getting caught, players must try and sneak past enforcers and cameras to progress each level. Players will swap locations of body parts to trick the cameras.

This is a student based project, which we were tasked to create as a group a game inspired by Ex-Machina, after 6 weeks we showcased it too the rest of the class.

Game is currently not completed, and development has been put on hold.
